DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study study effect EPA-enriched supplement compare conventional supplement malnourish head neck cancer patient undergone surgery . Primary outcome perioperative weight change .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy EPA-enriched Supplement Malnourished Head Neck Cancer Patients Undergone Surgery
DOC.detailed_description: To study effect EPA-enriched supplement compare conventional supplement malnourish head neck cancer patient undergone surgery . The patient divide 2 group receive different formula supplement . The supplement isocaloric . The patient receive supplement 3 week ( 1 week prior surgery 2 week post surgery ) Primary outcome perioperative weight change . Secondary outcome body composition , hospital stay day , complication co-morbidity .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Patients diagnosed Head Neck cancer pathological confirmation 2 . Receiving surgery primary treatment 3 . Malnutrition screen tool ( MST ) 2 1 . Previously irradiate patient Head Neck region 2 . Previously receive chemotherapy 3 . Renal insufficiency serum creatinine > 2.5 mg/dL 4 . Liver function abnormality total serum bilirubin > 3.0 mg/dL 5 . Pregnancy
